Content:: The Vicariate Apostolic of Pando (Latin: Apostolicus Vicariatus PandoÃ«nsis) is a Latin Church missionary ecclesiastical territory or apostolic vicariate of the Catholic Church in Bolivia. Its cathedra is located in the episcopal see of Riberalta.   This article on a Roman Catholic diocese in Bolivia is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
